description: Best-selling Ferrosi pants that zip-off into shorts and take the place of two items on your packing list. This Ferrosi spinoff uses the same updated eco-friendly fabric that is 45% recycled nylon with improved stretch and recovery for multi-day use.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Convertible Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: bluesign® approved 48% Recycled Nylon, 38% Nylon, 14% Spandex
